   contain the root `toctree` directive.

NER Module documentation
========================

The NER Module provides a set of tools and utilities for Named Entity Recognition tasks. 
It is designed to be easy to use and integrate into existing workflows.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   llm_client
   config
   prompts
   utils
   tools
